title: Can i participate in 2nd round
content: I haven't participated in first round nor paid the money, can I participate in 2nd counseling

comments.body: Yes you can, same thing I did
Last year right and u didn't pay money too right till 2nd round

PESU unlike many other colleges/univs doesn't consider round-2 as a automatic slide/float round. It is just like a fresh round-1, everyone is welcome... subject to rank. They go rank by rank from lowest rank applying in round-2, to higher ranks based on vacancies confirmed.
